statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value, owner_id FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE owner_id = 100 ORDER BY key_name DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE owner_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY key_id ASC;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'Master%' AND owner_id = 200;
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value, owner_id FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY owner_id DESC
SELECT key_id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT key_id, key_value, owner_id FROM encryption_keys WHERE owner_id = 2 OR owner_id = 4
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%key%'
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE encryption_key_id = 3;
SELECT data, encrypted_data FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_id ASC;
SELECT id, key_name FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT data FROM blockchain_data WHERE encryption_key_id = 3
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT block_id, encrypted_data FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_id ASC
SELECT key_name, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, key_type, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_type, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_type = 'AES';
SELECT block_id, data FROM blockchain_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, last_accessed FROM user_access WHERE key_access = TRUE;
SELECT id, key_type, key_value FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT block_id, data, encryption_key FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, key_access, last_accessed FROM user_access WHERE key_access = true;
SELECT id, key_type, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_type = 'AES' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT user_id, key_access, last_accessed FROM user_access WHERE last_accessed IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_owner ASC;
SELECT key_value, key_owner FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_data WHERE data_id = 10;
SELECT data_id, block_hash FROM blockchain_data WHERE block_hash LIKE 'abcdef%';
SELECT users.username, encryption_keys.key_value FROM users INNER JOIN encryption_keys ON users.user_id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT users.*, encryption_keys.key_value FROM users JOIN encryption_keys ON users.user_id = encryption_keys.key_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(username) FROM users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT users.username, encryption_keys.key_value FROM users LEFT JOIN encryption_keys ON users.user_id = encryption_keys.key_id ORDER BY users.username ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE password = 'password123';
SELECT block_number, data FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT user_id, key_id, access_level FROM permissions WHERE user_id = 5 AND access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'Master_Key';
SELECT block_number, data FROM blockchain_data ORDER BY block_number DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE id IN (1, 5, 10) OR username LIKE '%admin%';

SELECT keys.id, keys.key_name, logs.accessed_by, logs.access_time FROM encryption_keys keys JOIN key_access_logs logs ON keys.id = logs.key_id WHERE logs.access_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY logs.access_time DESC;
SELECT u.username, p.access_level FROM users u JOIN permissions p ON u.id = p.user_id WHERE p.access_level >= 2 ORDER BY u.username ASC, p.access_level DESC;
